review_title: A fair, ethical and supportive employer
pros:
So many...
1) Support my personal development 100% by contributing towards costs and giving me one day per week to study or attend any type of personal development events.
2) Flexible working as a mother and student
3) Fair pay package
4) Awesome Pension scheme - Final salary scheme!
5) Free parking and meal whilst on duty
6) 28 days leave plus bank holidays and close for Christmas - Heaven!
7) Transparent, caring and fair
8) Living Wage accredited
9) Strong values
cons: I am afraid I haven't got any...

review_title: Not just a workplace, also a home.
pros:
-A small but incredibly friendly and helpful team
-Free dinner at lunch time
-Beautiful and peaceful campus 
-Progression opportunities 
-Flexible working opportunity 
- Invitations to college events
-Week off over Christmas!
cons: I really couldn't think of any.
